The Ultimate One-Page Study Atlas: Instant access to Phrases, Alphabets, Numbers, Verbs (100 core lemmas + conjugations), and Kanji etymology. Toggle languages, search instantly, export your data, and use Edit Mode to standardize your own conventions.

≡ƒÜÇ Accelerated by the TSI Method:
This platform is designed as a tactical companion for the TSI (Target Structure Immersion) Protocol. Rather than relying on rote memorization, this tool helps you leverage high-frequency clusters, cognates, and structural roots to "hack" fluency and decode new languages intuitively.
